<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs=""
>
[Sisterstone Armor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1721)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Blood Lords</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #183: Field of Maidens](/Sources.aspx?ID=145) pg. 80</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk**  varies by armor
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

**Base Material** [Sisterstone](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1720)

</column>

---

Sisterstone armor incorporates stone plates. A creature wearing sisterstone armor gains the following activation to help defend an ally threatened by [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creatures.

<document level="2" id="action-1285" />
